Here we create the filename with parameters:


```{r sim}
if (plinkr::is_plink_installed()) {
  results <- sim_qt(
    sim_qt_params = create_test_sim_qt_params(),
    n_individuals = 2,
    temp_sim_filename = "temp.sim"
  )
  knitr::kable(head(results$simfreq))
}
```
